ygData.subject: About joint banks and advanced smithing guide
ygData.msgSnippet: Joint banks would probably make trades more desirable.  For instance a tailor and smith sharing their account and making it MUCH easier for the tailor to get
ygData.messageBody:
Joint banks would probably make trades more desirable. For instance a
tailor and smith sharing their account and making it MUCH easier for the
tailor to get to his metal bonings and/or studs.

That's why Verant won't do it =) It'll make something easier heheh.

Has anyone found the advanced smithing guides if there are any? I don't
mean the armor and weapons or the basic smithing ones. But ANY others
locations would be appreciated.
